comments.body: I wanted to make it possible to identify a REPL compilation unit simply. I remember seeing places where we identify them by the name of the file which we could simplify with this scheme.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +147,151 @@    objectNames.update(defs.state.objectIndex, objectTermName)

    val unit = new ReplCompilationUnit(ctx.source)
    unit.untpdTree = wrapped(defs, objectTermName, span)
    unit
